data.name: RAMS Full Feature Home Loan
data.description: A home loan with loads of features offering the ultimate in flexibility, parental leave options and a competitive rate, we are confident our RAMS full feature home loan has all you?ll probably need in a mortgage.

features.additionalInfo: Easy access to redraw on your home loan with debit card, ATM or cheque account

RAMS 100% offset Option.  An offset account is an everyday banking account which is linked to your variable rate home loan. Any money in this account is offset daily against your outstanding loan balance, reducing the interest payable on the home loan.
Unlimited ATM/EFTPOS & cheque access. Non Westpac Bank ATM charges apply.
myRAMS online banking. To access the site, you simply need to register by calling 13 7267

A Refinance Rebate offer of $3,000 is available on the product. The offer will apply to new RAMS customer  applications effective 1 September 2023 and where the eligibility criteria are satisfied. This offer excludes refinances of existing home loans within the Westpac Group, which include St. George, Westpac, Bank of Melbourne, BankSA and RAMS. The offer may be varied, withdrawn or extended at any time at the discretion of RAMS.

The New Purchase Buyer $1,000 Rebate offer is available for new home loan applications with a minimum loan size of $250k, received after 1 September 2023 and settled within 120 days. Offer may be varied or withdrawn at any time. A New Purchase Buyer is an applicant purchasing a property with an owner occupier or investment, principal & interest home loan (including construction loans). The offer is limited to one rebate per eligible home loan application.
The product includes extra repayment features
The product includes fraud protection features
Subject to terms and conditions, limited service is available
LMI Offer : Eligible first time buyers could reduce their Lender's Mortgage Insurance by up to $5,000.
Construction Option : Make progress payments for your new home build or renovation and pay interest on only your drawn down loan amount during the initial construction period.
Deposit Bond : Pay the deposit on your new home without dipping into your savings.
Fast Track : You could get into your new home sooner with family guaranteeing part of your loan amount.
Bridging Loan : You could still buy your new home even if you haven?t sold your old one yet. Welcome to a RAMS bridging loan.

eligibility.additionalValue: Those with an Australian permanent residency and who are currently in Australia

eligibility.additionalInfo: Applicant/s can be personal customers, company customers or family trusts.
Application Fee Waived off with Value Advantage Package

fees.name: Subsequent Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each subsequent valuation required on security property

fees.name: Settlement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee covers costs in arranging for our Panel Solicitor to attend Settlement with you and your Conveyancer or Solicitor

eligibility.additionalInfo: Settlement fee waived off with Value Advantage Package

fees.name: Fixed Rate Break Admin Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when all or part of your loan is fixed and you break the fixed rate period

fees.name: Fixed Rate Unwind Adjustment
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever part of your loan is under a fixed interest rate and you break the fixed rate period but the loan contract is not terminated.

fees.name: Fixed Rate Termination Cost
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever part of your loan is under a fixed interest rate and the loan contract is terminated.

fees.name: Additional Bank Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever more than 2 bank cheques are required to advance any part of your loan amount on the settlement date

fees.name: Default Rate
fees.additionalInfo: Current rate + 2% p.a. The rate of interest payable when your loan is in arrears

fees.name: Default Notice Fee - 14 days
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever the 14 day default notice is issued

fees.name: 30 days in Arrears Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever your loan is 30 days in arrears

fees.name: 60 days in Arrears Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever your loan is 60 days in arrears

fees.name: 90 days in Arrears Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever your loan is 90 days in arrears

fees.name: Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Payable per loan account plus legal and other costs incurred by us if you ask us and we agree to discharge any mortgage or loan account in connection with your loan agreement. Legal & other
associated costs incurred by us are paid separately.

fees.name: Lender's Mortgage Insurance premium
fees.additionalInfo: Lender?s Mortgage Insurance is required on loans under the following circumstances - Up to $1.5M when the LVR is over 80%, from $1.5M up to $3.5M when LVR is over 70%, more than $3.5M when LVR is over 60%

fees.name: Guarantee Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when guarantee documents are required to be prepared

fees.name: Trust Deed Review
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a Trust deed is required to be reviewed

fees.name: Company Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a company search is required

fees.name: Company Documentation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when documentation is prepared for a company borrower

fees.name: Old System Title
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when  an Old System Title is required for security

fees.name: Stamp Duty Refund
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a stamp duty refund is requested on your behalf

fees.name: ATM Operator Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Some Institutions may charge a fee for use of their ATMs

fees.name: Consent Fee Partial Release of Security
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request a release of any security. The third party costs to be paid separately.

fees.name: Legal and other costs
fees.additionalInfo: Legal and other costs incurred by us if you ask us and we consent to vary your loan and the variation requires us to change a loan party and / or a security.

fees.name: Additional Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if we require a valuation of the security at any time

fees.name: Annual Service Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This feature is optional. This fee is only applicable if you opt in for Value Advantage Package

lendingRates.additionalInfo: When the loan purpose is Owner Occupied and repayment type is Principal and Interest or the loan purpose is Owner Occupied Construction and repayment type is Interest Only for up to 24 months.  Any loan amount without Value Advantage Package option.  Switch to interest only repayments is not permitted in the first 12 months of the loan.
